Noelios Restlet Engine 0.15 beta

Noelios Restlet Engine is the reference implementation for the Restlet API.

See:
          Description

Noelios Restlet Engine
com.noelios.restlet Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions.
com.noelios.restlet.component Units of software instructions and internal state.
com.noelios.restlet.connector Mechanisms that enable communication between components.
com.noelios.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.
com.noelios.restlet.ext.freemarker Extension package providing integration with FreeMarker 2.3.
com.noelios.restlet.ext.javamail Extension package providing integration with JavaMail 1.3.
com.noelios.restlet.ext.jdbc Extension package providing integration with JDBC 3.0.
com.noelios.restlet.ext.jetty Extension package providing integration with Jetty 5.1.
com.noelios.restlet.util Various utilities.

 

Noelios Restlet Engine is the reference implementation for the Restlet API.
It is developped and supported by Noelios Consulting.
